1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic</e> <pb/><t>Wal 'a smasnil in c'ojol, 'oj wal in wach' paxti 'a Jehová.</t>
2: <t>Tzwal in wach' paxti 'a 'a, a swach'c'ojlal 'ayin, may b'a'n̈ 'oj 'at satc'ojlal wu'uj.</t>
3: <t>Yujto tzyac' niwnc'ojlal smasnil in mul, tzya'n b'oxc in c'ojol yic 'ay in yailal.</t>
4: <t>A tzin coln 'el 'a yol sc'ab' chamel, tzin schamc'ojlani, tz'o'ch pax sc'ojl 'ayin.</t>
5: <t>A tz'a'n tas wach' tzin c'uxu, yuj cha, coynto tzin quelmax pax tzwab' 'icha junc no salt'iw.</t>
6: <pb/><t>A Jehová tojl tzyutj sb'onyaj junc mach tz'ixtx yuj eb' 'ixtm 'anma'.</t>
7: <t>'Ix yac' 'ojcaxc 'el snab'en yuj Moisés, ax sb'ob'en satjub'tac yilxi, 'ix sch'ox yil eb' schon̈ab'.</t>
8: <t>Caw wach' snab'en Jehová, c'un yo'ch sc'ojl 'ayn̈ec, man̈ comnoc tzcot yowal, yujto caw 'ay schamc'ojlal.</t>
9: <t>Man̈toc junjn rato tzon̈ stumnec, man̈ smasnilc tiempo 'ay cot yowal.</t>
10: <t>Ma'oj yac' qui tup lajwquec qui mul mto qui maysch'olnilalec, 'a 'icha wal yoclemal.</t>
11: <t>Yel xo wal niwn schamc'ojlal 'a eb' yiclum 'a 'a, 'icha wal schan̈il yajb't satchan̈ 'a yib'n̈ lum lum tic, 'ixta schamc'ojlal chi 'a eb'.</t>
12: <t>Caw wal najt 'ix ya'cn 'at qui mulec yic 'ix yi'n 'el 'ayn̈ec, 'icha wal snajtil scal 'aj tzq'uel c'u yet' 'aj tz'ejm paxi, 'ixta 'aj x'at ya'cni.</t>
13: <t>'Icha wal yo'ch sc'ojl junc mamb'il 'a yunnal, 'ixta yo'ch sc'ojl Jehová 'a 'ayn̈ an̈ yiclum on̈c 'a 'a.</t>
14: <t>Yujto yojtac tas 'ajnc on̈c qui b'o'i, a yet' lum pococ b'ob'iln̈ec.</t>
15: <pb/><t>A qui q'uinlec an̈ 'anman̈ec tic, lajn wal 'icha sq'uinl te c'ultac; tzq'uib' cha'an̈, tznichni;</t>
16: <t>ax yic tzjaw 'ic' tzma'n can tacjoc, 'ixta tz'aj satx can 'ejm te 'a yet'l cha.</t>
17: <t>Palta a schamc'ojlal Jehová, may slajb' 'a 'ayn̈ to yiclum on̈c 'a 'a. A swach'c'ojlal 'ayc'n̈ej 'a yib'n̈ quin̈tlec b'aq'uin̈;</t>
18: <t>'ayc' 'a yib'n̈ eb' tzyiclni strato, atn eb' matz yac' sat sc'ojl 'a schecnb'il.</t>
19: <pb/><t>A Jehová sb'o sdespacho 'a satcha'an̈, ax ya'n Yajlil 'a yib'n̈ smasnil yolyib'n̈q'uinal.</t>
20: <t>Ex yángel Jehová to 'ay eyip, alc e wach' paxti 'a 'a, ex to yiclum ex 'a tas tzyala.</t>
21: <t>E masnil ex 'aj satcha'an̈, alc e wach' paxti 'a Jehová, yujto wan eya'n servil 'icha tznib'ej.</t>
22: <t>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová yuj smasnil tas b'ob'il yuj 'a yol smacb'en! <pb/>¡'A smasnil in c'ojol, 'oj wal in wach' paxti 'a Jehová!</t>
